There have been reviews on this slipper that claim the size runs small. I wear 11 and ordered an 11. At first when I put them on, the slipper felt snug but after wearing them they loosen up and they are true to size. I also have a high arc foot which makes the top of the slipper very snug. So, I have to pull the top lip of the slipper to get it over the arc of the foot so the pressure of the seam doesnt bother me. At first I had to constantly keep doing this to get the material to stretch out. Maybe North Face can add stretch band to the top seam like the ankle part of the slipper to improve on this. I also noticed the warmth of the slipper is superb indoor and outdoor, especially in cold weather like WI. I wear them with and without socks and prefer with socks as my feet stay dry with socks on. They are a great slipper though if you can find them in stock online or in a retail store.

I purchased this product as a replacement for older slippers that were loosing the traction on their soles.  I recently broke my leg and have tile floors so traction was very important to me.  I have had these slippers for a week and the "no skid soles" have already lost their traction bumps.  I would not recommend this product to if you are concerned with traction.  My expectations for this product might have been a little off.  I mean, perhaps I should have purchased something with more substantial soles.  Even so, I would expect the "no skid soles" to last longer than a week.  However, I do like that snoozies stay on my feet through the night - socks have a tendency to slip off but the elastic on the snoozies keeps them in place.

reviewText: Love Snoozies = My wife has several pair of regular Snoozies, but these were her first Skinnies and she loved them. Price is fair.  Many patterns/colors to choose from.

I'm so glad I tried these slippers and will continue ordering them for slippers around the house comfort.

These are the answer to footwear for  someone who gets too warm easily but wants to protect her feet from elements on the floor, especially at motels.  I love that I can get these on my feet easily.  I can wash them often without them pilling or losing color.  They are warm, but not so warm that my feet cannot breathe.  They are attractive and even theme oriented so I can take my seashell Slippers Skinnies Snoozies to Florida when I go or wear color coordinated pairs with my new comfy PJs.  Don't laugh, but I bought 6 pairs.  Different colors, and accessible as underwear!  LOVE THEM.

I gave 4 stars instead of 5 because one pair was not sewn properly at the toe. The seam was gapped open a little bit, revealing the white lining. Had I not sewn it closed prior to my mother wearing it, it would have fallen apart at the toe. Other than that, they're great! My mother has tender, painful feet but these soft stretchy slippers are very comfortable for her. The non- skid soles provide safety as well.

These shirts are great.  Great material.  Great construction.  Great look.  Great fit....if you are familiar with the sizing,  I was hesitant to order this initially.  I have shirts that I thought were similar, and knew that if they were the same, then I should order Medium instead of large.  Turns out these are those same shirts, or at least the fitting is the same.

I would order Large of most items (6'2" 175lbs).  These shirts I get in medium.  A large would be way too long.  They say they are meant to shrink with washing.  I've never had one shrink a noticeable amount.

That being said, I'm not round,  So I look for shirts that aren't made for round people.  Most shirts are too loose around the waist (and usually too short).  These shirts are perfect for what I need, when ordered in Medium.  No idea what to order if you are rounder.
summary: Great shirt.  Just be warned about the sizing.

reviewText:
Before buying this watch, I had been using a very cheap department store pocket watch. It stopped working so I started looking for a new one. I wanted to find a quality watch with the following characteristics: a unique and modern look, a good company/manufacturer warranty, and a functional time piece.

After doing hours of research over a few days, I decided on this watch. It came with the two year warranty and is made by a German manufacturer. The Detomaso website is informative and the customer service was very quick to answer my question about a few other watches via email.

First of all, this watch looks fantastic. The black finish combined with the red and silver highlights look very good together. The chain is also black and goes with the watch very well. I have been using it for about a month now and am very pleased. The Triplo has kept accurate time down to the second. The overall quality is excellent. The displays are very easy to read and the glass does not give off a glare under light.

The two smaller displays are used for other time zones. This watch features a chronograph to keep a running timer. The second hand for the chronograph is the large white hand with the T logo on it.  The large display contains three very small 1-hand faces inside of it. One is the second hand, one is the chronograph minute timer, and the other is a 24 hour clock. This watch has a very nice stainless steel casing that gives it some weight and sturdiness. The backside is all stainless steel (not painted black) with the Detomaso logo and name engraved/stamped into the steel.

The only thing I would change would be the chain clip. The concept is very cool and functional but it feels slightly cheap and breakable. If it were made out of a heavier duty material such as steel or a harder aluminum, I would feel more comfortable.

If anything else happens to change my review, I will post it here. Overall, this is an excellent watch that has met my every expectation!
summary: Finally, a good quality, modern pocket watch!

Good additons to anyone costume kits

They are cute and work well for my purposes, but have a few issues.

They are mounted on a clear strap with a tab to adjust the width, but the tab is a little slippy and doesnt hold its place very well. I was planning on mounting them to a wig, and I can think of a million other ways to deal with it, but still could be annoying. Even if the slip doesnt bother you, I might still recommend putting them on clips or another headband, just so you can have more freedom in where they sit on your head. You can achieve a lot of different looks with them depending on where you put them, which is great, but the strap can make it tricky to get them exactly how you want.

The look is cute, but there are very visible seams running along the sides of the horns. This is visible on all the photographs, so its not a surprise, but something to keep in mind. I was hoping Id be able to cut/sand them down, but because the horns are hollow and the seams appear to be holding the whole thing together, I'm afraid to mess with it too much. Im thinking of filling them with expanding foam to make them a little sturdier, but its not necessary. It would just make me feel a little more confident working on them and then toting them around.

It might be worth noting they are not perfectly symmetrical, which I think makes them look more natural, but I could see how might bother some.

Overall, I like them. There aren't a lot of options at this price point, and they are alright given how cheap they are. If you have the money, Im sure there are better options, but if not these will do the job.
summary: but still could be annoying. Even if the slip doesnt bother you

reviewText:
The top has 3 settings to clip together. The clips on the back of the top have to be clipped together by someone else. I'm an A cup and I wore a bra because the boob area was too big for me.
*I'm 5'3, 120lbs and the clips on the top were on the last set of clips (not the tightest setting--the last setting, if that makes sense).

Pros: 1. Great deal for the price. I purchased for around $8. Similar items are selling on Amazon and in store for $30.
2. Fits very well, I am a 34-36 B and it fits snugly on the top and doesn't feel like it would slip.
Cons: 1. Color- The body & back of this top is all white, except for the coloring that you see in the photos, unlike the real Captain America costume, which should have blue on the outside of the red stripes.
2. This is an actual corset and is very difficult to put on. You will either need to somehow slide it around after clasping it or ask a friend to help. Because the top fits snugly, I wasn't able for get more than 1/3 of it clasped on my own.
3. Mesh back- on either side of the clasps on the back of the corset there are mesh panels. I was hoping to be able to wear this as a shirt, but it doesn't seem to be designed that way. In the picture you can see my hand and the tag through the mesh, and also note the clasps- there are 16 total running down the back.
Overall, OK item. Because the price was so low I am considering taking it to a tailor to fix the coloring on the sides and back and add a zipper instead of the hook & eye closures on the back.
summary: Good for the value, but need more pictures on the listing

I honestly did not have high expectations after reading other reviews of similar watches. I went to YouTube and watched some reviews of Jaragar watches and decided to pull the trigger. The vendor sent the watch out within 24 hours of order. Watch arrived with the estimated delivery dates. Watch was in retail box. Watch in a never worn condition. All push pieces, crowns secure, doesn't seem prone to loss. Crown that operates slide rule very smooth. All hands are oriented properly to their respective dials. Sweep second action of second hand extremely smooth. Luminosity is nil on all treated parts. Dial is hard to read, but this watch is for sharper eyes. No markings on the case back to indicate water resistance. I would not recommend committing the watch to any sort of exposure to watch. Case back has a plastic display window. Movement is roughly finished and clean. I have seen Miyota movement look worse. Beats of the hair spring are strong and consistent. The movement will need time to settle in, it is running at a gain of 38.9 seconds on day two. I do not expect a chronometer certification. Case is substantial, roughly 49mm in diameter will fill the wrist. Strap is well made, stamped genuine leather and manufacturer. Buckle signed Jaragar. I will continue to watch for similar watches offered by Hamimelon. This was a second purchase, and I received a little break off of shipping I believe because of it. I recommend this watch.

reviewText:
A great basic tee for a baby. My little guy is 5mo, about 16lbs and 25" long, and the 6m fits just like I wanted it to - comfortably through the shoulders, slim but not snug through the body, and plenty long (babies' shirts tend to ride up as you're holding them or they're on their bellies!). The fabric weight is moderate, not tissue jersey like Kavio's raglan tees (which we also have) but not as heavy as like a Hanes Beefy T. It is not super stretchy, it's not going to stretch out.

Not cons necessarily, but things to be aware of:
- The colors are not bright, they're pretty moderate; significantly softer than they appear on my screen. Cobalt is not a primary blue, more like a lightened navy. Caribbean is not a clear tropical blue-green but more beach glass-ish. The one exception of the six colors I have is the orange - it's what it looks like, strong (but not neon) slightly red orange.
-If your baby has a high-percentile head circumference, this is probably not the shirt for you. The neck is a regular crewneck with no snaps, and as I said, it's not the stretchiest fabric. Average-headed babies should be fine though.
-If you want a looser fit, you'll definitely want to go up a size, or if your baby is very chubby for his or her length. This is a great shirt for average to skinny babies. I recommend consulting the size chart rather than going with your baby's age.
-I can't comment on the durability. They seem well-constructed and don't feel cheap. When I had a problem with a different style of Kavio! shirt losing its hem fast, the seller (Hip Together) sent me a new one immediately with no return, and I've had no problem with the replacement.

reviewText: I had doubts about this bag when I opened the package. It is very tiny. There is no way that  it would hold a phone. You could fit in a compact, a lipstick, and a small credit card/bill holder, but probably not much else. My second concern is that it is a very shiny gold. The metal fittings are okay, but there is an underlying gold mesh fabric. It is very yellow. On the plus side, this purse is really cute. It has a definite 1920's vibe. The bottom of the  Pretty Guide Gatsby dress I purchased from Amazon is scalloped, with gold sequin "lines" that reiterate the shape of the bag. The purse looks really cute with the dress, so I kept it. I think the gold color should be more "antique", but that is a designer/manufacturer issue, and a matter of personal taste. I did love that it comes with two chains, short and long, and doesn't seem to snag on my dress.

reviewText:
This item is listed as their plus size version, but it's not. They have another version that IS plus size, however. Overall, I think the dress itself is great - I'm just not sure how I feel about it on me. First of all, I'm 5'9'' and finding a maxi that actually goes to my ankles is difficult to begin with, and this one is typical in that regard; It probably sits about 2 1/2 to 3 inches above my ankle. It's made well, especially for the price (I've been doing a lot of bargain shopping on Amazon lately, and in general, I'm pleasantly surprised at the quality), and is a nice buy for people on a budget.

Although this dress comes with a built-in slip, it's not enough to disguise underwear (at least with the white color) so you'll either need to wear nude undies or purchase an additional slip to wear underneath. As someone else said, the tie for the dress is the same color and material as the dress - which doesn't bother me at all. The company also threw in a free, cute necklace when I bought it. Not sure why, but it was a neat surprise because no other company on Amazon has done that for me before! :)
summary: Listed as "Plus Size", but it's incorrect.

This fit of this trenchcoat was actually really great. I bought it in size small and it was extremely comfortable. However, as usual, you get what you pay for. This is definitely a good trench coat for the price. However, I had a trench coat from Express that cost twice as much I was considering as well. I waited until this one was delivered and eagerly tried them both on for comparison. I really really wanted DJT to win but sadly, Express was the clear victor. It was just much heftier, better fitted (ie made me look slimmer) and better quality overall. The other thing I didn't like about this coat was that the material seems to have some sort of micro glitter in it. it's barely obvious but I don't prefer it. Also, the belt is a little too high waisted for my taste. Overall, I would recommend this if you are on a budget. Normally I would go for the cheaper option if the only difference is the brand. However, I really want a coat that will last me for a few years to come and I figure, I might as well spring for the option that is much more likely to last through several wash cycles.
summary: This fit of this trenchcoat was actually really great. I bought it in size small and it ...

reviewText:
JUST FOLLOW THE SIZE CHART!
I can not stress this enough. If you know your measurements and you use the size chart provided, the jacket will fit. Do not order a Medium because you normally wear a medium T shirt. It doesn't work that way.
I sized up to a large due to reviews saying the jacket ran small. My measurements put me in a medium on the provided size chart. I am 5'9, 36 bust 27 waist and 39 hips. The Large was huge. I exchanged for the medium (which I would have initially ordered had I followed the size chart). The medium fit well; It fits in the shoulders but is a little loose in the waist and looks frumpy. The sleeves are even a little on the long side, again I am 5'9.
I am exchanging again for the small. I have an hour glass figure and I am willing to have it a little tight across the shoulders if it will be more fitted through the waist as I will be wearing this for a more formal look over dresses. If you have a larger tummy or breasts don't size down. Just follow the size chart.
Obviously I really like the coat or I would not be exchanging this many times. It is a good quality for the price and seems fairly warm, water resistant and easy to pack.
Hope this helps :)
Update: The small fits great! It is even a little loose in the waist.

After reading some reviews here, I was concerned with the sizing. I'm 5'3, 102 lbs, normally a size 2. Ordered a size small, and it came in the mail within 3 days. It was packaged and sealed in a bag, which was probably why it came wrinkled and why some people may have complained. Stuck it in the dryer and it flattened out a bit. Once I started wearing it, the wrinkles went away. The quality is not too bad. For 40 dollars, you get what you pay for. That does not mean it's bad quality. The Khaki color did have a slight pinkist tone in a certain light, but not outside. It's a little glossy instead of a solid tone, but looks nice. The buttons are kind of hard to close because the slit is not wide enough, but goes though. II wore it during 50-60 degree weather with a sweater underneath  so there is enough room to layer up. I  marked a line on the coat with a black pen a few days ago by accident. Came right off with dish soap!  I only wish the coat had a more structured fit. It's a good basic trench coat for the Spring if you don't want to spend a lot.
summary: The quality is not too bad. For 40 dollars

reviewText: I love this bag!  I only gave 4 stars because I am short (5'2) and I can't adjust the strap as much as I'd like.  None the less, this is my travel purse on vacation and for work. Possibly the best travel bag I have ever bought. I have an obsession with convenient travel items. I bought this for a trip to Florida. It is comfortable to wear and held all of my necessary items. My ipad was easily accessible and I was amazed how much I was able to fit in it.

Sometimes, you just need to be hands free, but still have your stuff close at hand.  This bag does all of that.  I like it much better than the cross-body designs because the strap gives more control over distribution of weight across your shoulder.  It's also handy if you have to snag the two year old grandkid from running amok.  I like it!  Won't hold the week's files, but it's a great grab and go bag.
summary: I like it much better than the cross-body designs because the ...

reviewText:
Great cross-body shoulder bag. I bought this some 8 years ago, the brown version. The ripstop nylon and VERY comfortable wide webbing adjustable straps makes carrying various loads very very effortless and comfortable.

The bag is not waterproof, however. I found this out when caught in a moderate downpour a few years back. But it's solid quality and after so many years of use, it's still like new. Great build quality.

It loses 1 star because the bottom of the bag and sides are not padded at all. Just slightly thicker ripstop nylon. So if you have delicate electronics and you bang the bag around, try to keep them in the inner pockets. The strap pocket can fit an iPhone 5S with a normal case, which rocks. Though if you are busty, I would opt to put the phone in one of the side pockets or an inner pocket, as it will chaff.
summary: Great bag, reliable, durable, and very well balanced.

My 18 year old son is just over 6 ft tall and wears a 16 slim in fitted button downs. This shirt was too big for him, but that was my fault. I should have gotten the extra large. He still loves it and wears it all the time. He has a slightly elongated torso, so trendy store brand T's like Old Navy tend to be a little smaller in the shoulders and shorter than standard T's like this one. I went bigger, because I was worried about the reported shrinkage from other reviews and didn't want his hips to be exposed. A big no no for him. Pick your size like you would when picking out a standard T-shirt, like a typical screen print type and you should be fine.

The socks are very snug in the shin area, but correct around the feet themselves.  It makes for a snug fit without shinguards (which is fine, we can still get good use of them!).  So if you have anything up the foot to accomodate, or a child a little thicker in the shins---size up.

These juDanzy baby, toddler and girls tall knee high socks are great. They shipped in a fast an timely manner and were well packaged. These socks work great for my 2 year old daughter. These socks fit her feet well, are breathable, stay up and in place. The elastic at the top of the sock is not to tight and does not dig into her skin, like other knee socks do. These knee high socks feature the juDanzy anti-slip grip soles, which help stop slipping on smooth surfaces. They are made of 80% Cotton, 15% Polyester, 5% Spandex. They come in many different colors, designs and sizes. I will definitely be purchasing more of these great socks.

reviewText: I bought two pairs of these this winter and they did keep me warm.  I have a hard time maintaining a steady body temperature, so these were perfect for wearing under long and short skirts and to sleep in, depending on the night.  They did, as I would expect, tend to stretch out and fall down after  long day of adjusting.  This is an indication of quality more than anything.  The only thing that is hard is that dogs and cats like to scratch at the very cute pompons on the tops (held up with a strand of yarn) and used as a tightening cord. Also, the pompom is a good way to tell what is "up" side.  Sadly, if you are lazy and don't pay attention, it can be easy to step on the pompom yourself.  It's not a big deal, but the poms are part of what makes these "cute".

When I saw the price on this one I thought it was a typo or maybe they were just selling the top or bottom separately for that price, but I was thrilled when I saw the whole suit was under $15!!  Ladies, if you are hesitant about this one, don't be.  It's great.  You may have to order a larger size than normal to accommodate the difference in sizes between the US and overseas.  Normal size would be a medium but I had to order an XL, who cares, it fits and looks fantastic.  I couldn't be happier. reviewText: It fit perfectly!  Fast shipping, easy to work with. Answered my emails right away!

I'm a US10 and ordered one size up, and the fit was perfect. The sweetheart neckline is pretty & simple. The pleated details is as image, may require some steaming/light pressing once received. The dress is soft, super flowy and the mermaid skirting starts approximately 12" from hips (approximately 1.5" under one's behind). The dress is pretty long (extra 5"-6"), and i took it to a tailor to get it shortened (ends 0.5" extra to heel height) and once i tried it on, i noticed the proportion of the dress was off. I'm 5'3" and curvy (bust 36" and hips 39"), the shortened mermaid skirt did injustice towards the dress which then looked out of shape & awkward in comparison to the pleated part of the dress, plus it made me look shorter than my actual height and my behind appeared to pop out more than naturally. What was a very feminine, chic, sleek and figure-flattering dress when i initially received & tried on, turned out to be a stumpy, 3/4 tight dress with a loose chiffon skirt hanging around it. I really like this dress, simple, beautiful & at a somewhat fair price, and would recommend contacting seller for a tailored fit/measurement. If not possible, then i would say this dress is made for taller than 5'3" ladies.

reviewText: At the last minute, I decided to go "formal" to my 50th high school reunion.  It was joke since everyone else was VERY casually dressed.  I was trying to make the point that the 50th should have been more special.  I got on Amazon to look for something inexpensive that looked dressy.  Since this dress was "one size fits all," I figured I couldn't go wrong.  The dress arrived the afternoon of the "event," a backyard BBQ at a classmate's home, and I wore it with pride.  Along with a tiara I ordered and a sash I made with sequins spelling out, "What?! No Formal both?!," I made my point.  VERY HAPPY with the dress AND the seller.

reviewText: This purse is stunning and very well made. My husband and I had the Velveteen Rabbit read at our wedding and could not believe my luck when I found this.  A couple of things to think about.  This will not hold a smart phone.  I have a 6s and it will unfortunately not fit.  It is quite small inside so think about what you absolutely have to have in the purse before your purchase.  Also at the price point it would make a beautiful shower gift for a bride or bridesmaids gifts.  It is lovely enough to sit on a vanity of formal room after a wedding.  You should also know that the purse comes in a beautiful gift box.  I did not request anything special so I assume all the purses come in these boxes.  Perfect for gift giving.  If a several thousand dollar designer 3D purse is in your dreams but not your budget this is perfect.  And honestly no one will know the difference.

Wantdo makes the most comfortable men's underwear I have ever tried (I am over 60)!  Having said that, I would advise prospective buyers that this company is based in China and a bit of patience may be required.  I love their boxer/brief style with a small cloth waistband.  This type has the rubber embossed "wantdo" logo on the outer  front.  I accidentally ordered the boxer/brief with the large "HERO" logo waistband and I returned it as I don't like large elastic waistband, and there's apparantly another style with a large waistband with a printed 'Wantdo" logo.  They have many differing styles under a single page on Amazon's site, so choose carefully.  On top of that, they don't have all styles/sizes in all colors so it's tricky picking out the style one prefers in the color of choice.  Also, when I received my first order, they were XL size.  I had ordered M (medium).  I wrote to the company to arrange a return and received an email from a representative who suggested I first try them on as they were Asian sizes.  To my amazement, they fit perfectly.  I have a 32 waist and usually wear a medium.  The quality of the product makes all this a minor inconvenience and I didn't even mind paying $18.00 per pair, which I have never done before.  Maybe I am just unaware, but I don't know of any American apparel company making underwear of 95% Modal, (a fiber derived from bamboo), 5% spandex (so comfortable!) with a perfectly designed shape to accommodate the male anatomy and look so good at the same time!
Most comfortable pair of briefs that I have ever owned.  They are very light and feel like you are wearing nothing at all.  Plan to purchase more for traveling.

When you try to stretch them to that position, your nipples get caught in the holes of the fishnet.  The bottoms are a bizarre style.  There is a seam right down the center in the back, creating a "pucker" (as suggested in the name). This pucker makes it almost impossible for the bottoms NOT to wedge, unless you have some serious "back".

reviewText: It is different but not as expected. The neck is not smuggle tight like the picture shown here. Thin sweater which is great for my husband since he do not like really thick ones. However, you pay what you get and the neck is like a cowl neck instead of a turtleneck.

This is my new favorite shirt. A few notes, however:
1. This is a 'slim fit' shirt. If you are looking for a loose or baggy fit, this is not the shirt for you.
2. The fabric is not as thick as the picture looks. Sorry, this is more of a knit shirt than a sweater. If you want something to keep you warm in cold weather, maybe try something else.
3. The collar has to be styled in order to stand up. It's little more than a sewn on flap. You have to fold it inside in order to get it to stand like it does in the picture.
4. Asian sizes run smaller than US sizes. I'm 6'1", 150 lbs, 30" waist with a very slim build and a medium is a casual fit. I plan on ordering a small because I like my clothes form-fitting.
5. Keep in mind that the photo pictured here is on a mannequin with athletic measurements and with a man's face and hands photoshopped on. It will not look like that on you unless you have an athletic physique.
6. The collar is a bit wider and not as tall as pictured, which I actually wound up liking more anyway.
A note about care: Do not ever put this in a dryer, the materials are not designed for it. Add extra spin cycle to your washer and this puppy will come out nearly dry. I took it straight from the washer, hung it up for a few hours and it was ready to wear. Shipping was faster than expected (10 days as opposed to the estimated three weeks)

The only con I have to mention is that the shirt does not come with extra buttons in the event that one becomes detached or lost.

This was a gift for a lady that I don't know, but I am acquaintances with her girlfriend & I had ordered her a similar necklace because I like her style & she likes mine & I didn't think that it was appropriate to give someone a gift  & not the other. I don't know if she received it or if she likes it or ifshe will wear it, but I like it very much. The skull is quite large & heavy with beautiful flowers & swirl designs all over it. It is definitely a necklace, not a bolo tie, like the picture appears. I wish that I could wear it, but I'm allergic to metal. I'd order one for myself & display it on my wall, if the price goes back down to where it was.
I recommend this to wear to nice events where you don't have to move around a lot, not jogging or dancing. It would hurt very much if it hit you while running, but would come in handy if someone was in your bubble & makes you uncomfortable! Irrecommend this for a teenager or adult female, not a male, because of the exquisite designs. It is not a glitter that gets all over the place. I don't recommend this for a young child, but only because it is too heavy for them & the long chain would get caught in their backpack straps or on the swingset, etc
If you want to buy it like I did & give similar but different designs for, say, your daughters, or for best friends, look for the skull bow tie mask design necklace & there are others. This is not a cheap looking skull, though, I personally don't think that the chain is attractive. The skull pendant is absolutely gorgeous & deserves to be showcased on a nicer looking chain.
Perfect for the goth/punk/emo/vampire ladies. All eyes will be on you & this skull wherever you wear it.

(If you need to turn yours around you just pull on the top of the charm and take the globe off then put it back in the right way. reviewText:
I've purchased one of these necklaces before (albeit from another seller on Amazon), and this one didn't quite compare.

I received the package in a timely manner and it was packaged well. At first glance, the necklace looked fine. It is a cheap, costume item, so I wasn't expecting much. However, it still managed to disappoint. As mentioned, I've ordered this exact necklace before, and it was beautiful. Unfortunately, this one looks sloppily put together. Taking a close look, I noticed that many of the "stones" are shoddily glued in. They aren't even in place. There's a clear setting where the stone should be, and most of them are glued halfway out. And obviously so. Furthermore, some of the finer metal details on the upper attachment (above the moon) are broken. I'm very disappointed in this purchase. It's always a gamble ordering this cheap stuff, and this time it didn't pay off. It looks nice at a distance, but you don't have to get too close to see the mistakes.
summary: Not as nice as the last one.

The length of the shoe is good, they are super cute, and quality of the leather seems good so far. However, as other people have said, the ankle elastic is way too tight! I do not have a roly-poly baby. He's muscular but does not have what I would consider thick ankles. I left these shoes in for about 2 1/2 hours, and when I took them off the red lines were dark and deep from the elastic. It took about an hour for his ankles to look better. That can't be comfortable! To fix this, I snipped the elastic and reattached it so that it is now no longer attached through the tongue of the shoe but to each side of the shoe. This has made it loose enough to fit well, but still plenty snug so it does not fall off. Not sure why these are so crazy tight! Probably won't get Momo's again for my kiddo.

A button may of fell off here or there but always came with them all and very easy to sew back on. I do not dry any of their clothing; and because of this- the clothes never lose their shape or color. reviewText: This is such a lovely nightgown!  I am so happily surprised to receive such high quality at such a reasonable cost.  This is every bit as good as - if not better than - any of the Eileen West nightgowns I've bought over the years.  The cotton is thick and crisp, tightly woven so that it feels softer than silk against the skin.  The trimmings and lace are of excellent quality and the sewing and tailoring are exquisite.  There is something about this kind of cotton that even with long sleeves keeps you cool in the summer and warm in the winter.  Wearing it, I feel pampered and pretty and my husband thinks it's beautiful on me.  I will definitely buy more of these!  I've already put 6 or 8 on my wishlist and left lots of hints for my birthday!

reviewText: When I first seen these on sale at a local brick and mortar golf store, I was skeptical and wondered if they would hold up and most importantly, will they be comfortable.  I have to say, it was money well spent and wish I bought 2 pairs.  All of us in my foursome group bought a pair that day and we are pleased.  They run a half size big, so if you're like me a size 10, go with a 9.5. All of my buddies had to do the same.  I was expecting the boot was going to hurt my feet from pressure/friction points, but I was wrong.  After walking many 18 rounds, my feet have never been sore.  I was surprise in the comfort and water proofing.  I played during fall and winter 09-10, and if you live in Seattle, you know how much it rains here.  My feet have never gotten wet or moist from walking in muddy to soggy conditions.  The only wear and tear so far is replacing the shoe laces and cleats after this fall/winter season.
summary: If you play golf in the NW, recommended

reviewText: My daughter loved this for her birthday. Very romantic!

This was one out of about 10-15 gothic victorian-looking pieces I ordered from Yazilind, and overall, I'm very happy with all of them. I'll be honest that I was worried with a larger order of so many small items that the seller might forget one or two items when shipping, but they were all there when I got the parcel. Some of them do need a smidge of DIY TLC. Have some superglue ready in case of pieces falling off (trust me, pieces will never fall off again). Really, though, even with a little assembly needed for SOME of Yazilind's products (only 3 out of the 10-15 I ordered even needed any altering), you're getting some very nice jewelry for the price! I get compliments on my bracelets, necklaces, and wrist cuffs all the time! It's my little secret that they were less than $5 each! The only part of the pieces I received I didn't like was that the bracelets are lobster clamps - so hard to get on by yourself! I feel like pull ties would be much more manageable, and probably look better, too. I will probably find some threads for them and replace the metal chains on the bracelets with pulls instead when I get the chance. Other than those few small complaints, all the items I received from Yazilind were as pictured, comfortable, and very charming. I'd definitely suggest this item as well as other similar pieces in Yazilind's collection.

FANCY DRESS STORE HOT IRREGULAR CHIFFON FULL SKIRT LONG EVENING WEDDING PARTY DRESS SLEEVELESS - ONE SIZE  - LIGHT BLUE

I was looking for a formal dress to wear to a wedding and a not so formal dress to use in the rehearsal dinner, so I ordered 21 dresses in total, 12 were from Ever Pretty (just love the dresses they make). I'm reviewing each of these dresses (see a list of them at the end):

About me: 5" 2 tall  / weigh about 152 pounds / bust - 94 cm (37" ) / waist - 82 cm (33" ) / hip - 110 cm (43" ) / shoulder - 40 cm (16" ) / floor length - 143 cm (57" )

Size  - it is very important that you use the measurement given by the manufacturer in the description. I ordered this and the dress  fits perfectly. I use US size 8 or 10 or medium; I measured myself beforehand to check with the manufacturer size table. Also have in mind that if you are well endowed, I would recommend to order a size bigger .

The chiffon is very nice and of good quality and the color is wonderful...they say it's light blue, but is more a light greenish tone love the color! - this dress is a classic one and makes you feel very feminine and slim; I really liked. Fits so nicely, but I was looking for a floor length dress and did not paid attention to the length they gave of 138cm so it ends a little higher than my ankles...would be nice it it was just a little longer. The buttons could be of better quality and most probably if I kept it would change for some more fancier...it's an easy fix!

The inner layer (lining) is a non-stretch knit, but very soft and comfortable; the lining does not go all the way down...it's up to the knees.

reviewText:
EVERYONE needs to know their size. Check and double check the size conversation before ordering. If it ends up being a little on the big side, you can always find a tailor or seamstress and see if they can help downsize it for you. I ordered a L that fit perfectly around the torso, but the arms were a bit baggy. I went into my local tailor and got the sleeves more slim fitting for a small fee.

In terms of material, it's probably a blend with a high percentage of polyester. Thin, smooth, with a bit of shine. Great for cosplay, but I'm not sure if I would wear it as a normal outfit. It just gives off too much of a costume vibe for my taste.

Shipping was better than I expected. Packaging was nice as well. It actually arrived a whole week before the expected delivery date. Considering the distance it gets shipped, I probably just got a lucky hand. Still, that was awesome.

The shirt is officially licensed but is also officially flimsy, defective, of poor quality and not true to size.  I ordered a size large (10-12).  The shirt  I received was more like a medium (6-8).  The underarms were not smooth seams but instead had acccordian style pleats. The pleats were bad enough, but then each pleat was white (instead of the blue and pink colors of the design).  Manufactured in Mexico, the shirt is 100 % polyester, (it has no cotton) which means that it has to be washed separately, in cold water on gentle cycle, laid flat to dry and then touched up with a warm, dry iron.  Definitely not the quality shirt you would purchase at The Disney Store and not very practical, especially for a child.  I am giving it one star because the design was cute.

Factory Extreme is a very nice company.  They were surprisingly careful about my order, making sure that the measurements I sent them were correct (I have odd dimensioning).  I wanted the coat to look as close as possible to the one worn by Willem Dafoe, so I asked them to make a red liner which they did for free.  The fit is excellent.  My wifes first words upon seeing it on me were that coat fits you perfectly.

The coat as delivered had almost a suede like finish, but an hour or two with some Meltonian black shoe polish made quite a difference.  Now it has a nice even sheen to it.  Im sure that further polishing with a harder shoe polish would make it even shinier.

The belt included was way too long for me, so I will have a seamstress make it shorter.  The coat has two internal and two external pockets.

It arrived only about one week after I placed the initial order, much faster than Amazon predicted.  Overall I am very pleased with this coat.  Nice job.

The best part however is the customer service you get from FactoryExtreme. As soon as you order it they will email you and ask for your measurments (you can go to their website to see how to measure instructions) so you get a "perfect fitting jacket". I love it and I just ordered their FactoryExtreme Summit Endurance Mens Black Distressed Leather Jacket that will be coming in a week.

I would definitely say that the Small fits more like an XS but that was fine for me.  I would recommend sizing up though accordingly. The bottoms were great because they came right up to my natural waistline. Often times, high-waisted things don't fit around my waist quite right - either resting too high or too low. Or the waist part won't be as fitted as I like. But that's not the case with these. They fit snug and comfortably.  The top also fits nicely. The color is beautiful and the halter straps are really flattering. I would definitely recommend this swimsuit. I received this product at a discount in exchange for honest and unbiased review.

Not made well. The buttons where too shiny for me. I wanted to replace them myself. Also, the top left pocket with zipper is not a functioning one. It is merely for show. I would have left it out completely if I designed this jacket or at least made it a functioning pocket. It would have made a handy pocket to store MP3 or your phone inside. In addition, it was advertised that it was made small so buyers where advised to order a size up than they normally wear which I did and it was still too big. Over all, I was not impressed with it...a first for me since everything I have bought in Amazon were satisfactory if not stellar. I learned a valuable lesson not to buy fashion online without seeing the product first for myself and be able to try it on. I will stick to buying clothes at my favorite stores. I do not recommend this jacket at all. If you are interested, buy with caution.

FWIW, I'm ~5'7" , ~110lbs or less, and the Asian M is.. roomy on me. Which is fine - it means I can wear a bulky sweater or sweatshirt and not worry about busting the seams - and it's still a much better fit than any American men's 'small'. Quality is very nice - this isn't a heavy winter coat, more suitable for autumn (or early spring), and as mentioned in other reviews, most of its details are just decorative. Which isn't quite to say they're non-functional - they do make the coat look nicer, or less plain.. and really, if you've ever actually put stuff in breast pockets, you'd know it looks weird. Besides, there are four usable pockets, which is one more than many jackets..

reviewText: I read probably hundreds of reviews of this suit through various suppliers...and I gambled because the suit was cute, but SUPER cheap. If it didn't work I wouldn't feel bad. HOWEVER...this suit is AMAZING. Ordered/shipped/arrived within 2 business days. I could've ordered a small, but based on reviews I ordered medium. I am 5'7" 128#, I wear a small 32/34 B. Although the top has a smaller actual cup, it would easily accommodate a larger size, maybe up to C or small D. What is small, and more important, is the size of your rib cage under your chest/boobs. I measure 31, and this fits PERFECT. Not tight, just right.  This suit has harder shelled removable cups, which was unexpected and a nice surprise. The top of the halter has tie strings. I could've easily been comfortable wearing this even 10lbs heavier.  The torso length is perfect for someone my height. Can't say enough good things about this suit. I never ever write reviews...but this deserves one. I'm a skeptic and very picky about purchases, but honestly, buy the suit already. And I mention how cheap it was?! Totally worth it!!! After trying it on, I could've ordered a small? But I'm happy in the medium. If you're my size, you could pick either size depending on how you like your for.

I bought this for my wife for travel.  She said she was a little nervous wearing her diamonds around foreign countries without me there, but she wanted a wedding band.  She really likes Celtic patterns, so I bought this for her for our 15th anniversary.  She likes it SO much, she wears it with her engagement ring more than she wears her original eternity band now.  She says it's very comfortable and elegant, and she likes that the design goes all the way around so she doesn't have to turn it constantly.  It's accurately sized and has the comfort band feature with the rounded edges.  Awesome.  If I didn't love my ring so much, I'd probably get one for myself.  It IS a little wider than a traditional female band, but the cutout design makes it elegant and beautiful despite this.

Bought these for a cosplay last minute. They shipped fast but I wasn't happy with anything else.
First of all, they are made of a very hard, thick, orange plastic so they don't look realistic at all, and you cannot blend them in with makeup.
Second, they did not stay on. At all. Even with a liberal application of spirit gum, they kept falling off. For the few minutes they stayed on, they were mismatched and the left was bigger than the right. They were cut in all the wrong ways, and the plastic they were made out of was wayyyy to heavy! I wasn't able to wear them during the convention and ended up being very very disappointed.
To anyone who is getting these for a cosplay, and not just a quick casual costume: do not buy these!!!

reviewText:
This shopping experience was a nightmare.  I ordered the necklace as a Christmas present.  It arrived on 12/22, but was a different necklace than pictured.  I immediately called and they said they'd ship the correct necklace via Next Day Air.  The 2nd necklace arrived and was the same WRONG necklace.  At this point, my Christmas present was ruined.

I requested that they issue a Call Tag or send a shipping label for me to return the products.  It took over 3 weeks and at least 8 phone calls to get the necklaces returned and a credit issued.  Every time I called, I got a different excuse.  I finally had to get their UPS account # and do it myself.  On 3 occasions, I was assured that someone would return my call, and they NEVER did.  I spent so much time on this - it was ridiculous.

This was horrible from start to finish.  I will never again order from this company.
summary: HORRIBLE HORRIBLE HORRIBLE - BEWARE OF THIS COMPANY!

reviewText: Nice heavy duty watch with a well made reliable Japanese automatic movement on par with some Swiss made movements.  Has a 40, 45 hour reserve on the main spring so no problem resetting the time in the morning if you take it off at night.  The automatic watch can sit unused for months and will start immediately when worn because it is an automatic watch, normal activity will charge the main spring and power the watch.  I chose this watch because it is not so expensive that I am concerned about damaging it when working in the garden or working on some home repairs.  Not like a Rolex or Tissot, or Omega.  Bottom line, it is an automatic which means no dead batteries.  Another plus it looks good, the strap  is heavy and will take wear, the case is heavy duty, has a Sapphire crystal, and best for me with poor eyesight I can read the date.  The ability to read the date without a magnifying glass was the feature that sold the watch.  I have some expensive Swiss watches , and the dates are too small to see.  This DETOMASO DT20 has a good sized readable date.  I am very satisfied.
summary: Nice heavy duty watch with a well made reliable Japanese ...

reviewText:
I really like this dress.  I'm in the U.S. and it shipped from the UK remarkably fast.  The estimated arrival time was 6 weeks, I got it within about 8 days.
It fits well. I'm a size 14 but got the 16/18, so maybe figure on going one size up.
I've seen reviews that state this is a maternity style dress, but it's very elegant and flattering for any shape, esp curvy.  The back of the dress is a little plain, but no one will be looking at your back ;)
Dress didn't fade or shrink when I washed and dried normally.  Hung it up right out of the dryer and no ironing was needed.
Only reason I gave it 4 stars was because
1: they were out of the color I really wanted, but I think I may order some other colors, too.
2: the inside hem of the V-neck part is no hem at all.  it's just cut fabric that's folded inward and I found myself having to re-adjust it so it wouldn't show, but it doesn't seem to be unraveling even after laundering.

All in all, pretty dress, great price, easy clean, will get more.

I bought this top to wear with high-waisted skirts. I like to wear my skirts super high-waisted, with a couple inches of skin showing underneath my bust line. I chose this crop top because I liked how it is cropped shorter than many other crop tops, which seem to hit a couple inches above the belly button.

However, this top cuts too short. I am a 5'6 female, 130lbs, and I got a size medium. I am not large-chested - I am a 34B, and this top shows underboob. If I lift my arms up, my breasts will fall out of the top entirely. My boyfriend finds this both horrifying and amusing.

What the top really needs is an elastic band at the bottom to hold it in place, but it does not fit tightly around the bust line at all. I have remedied the problem by wearing a basic black bralette underneath it. The top tends to ride up to where my nipples are regardless, but with the black bralette underneath, you can't tell that it has rode up unless you are up close.

The material is soft, and the top otherwise fits well. If you are an A cup or less, this top might work better for you. But I would not recommend it for anyone else.
summary: Would not recommend for anyone who is larger than an A cup.

Its an overall solid shoe. Provides great support and resistance for when you want to launch yourself off the floor. I have no problem sprinting down the court, jumping, or changing direction. However, there is a certain level of discomfort, at least in my case. After a hard indoor game or a few hours of playing outside, I do find my feet being pretty sore and tired. The front of my toes hurt, and the arch of my foot feels exhausted (I did not have this problem with other shoes in the same size, although they had less explosive capabilities).

I would say these are good in-game shoes. If you want shoes to just shoot around, practice, or maybe to play in the street for a few hours, I would say these shoes wouldn't be the wisest choice. However, if you play in an indoor league these shoes provide the support and resistance to perform well in-game.

Summary: Strong, durable shoe. Great for indoor game(s), not ideal for everyday practice. Good game shoes for the price. 4 stars.

reviewText: Too small but otherwise it could have been 5 star

I wanted to love this dress. I really, really did. And despite reading some strange reviews, I took the gamble of buying it considering it was only $15 and came with free returns.

Thank goodness for the free returns because there is no way I'm keeping this dress. The color is the single good thing about it. They are exactly as pictured and very lovely.

This is a trapeze style dress and yes, as another review mentioned, it only has one arm hole. She didn't get a defective dress (as I had imagined); that's how it's intentionally designed and made. The neck-tie at the top effectively creates the other arm hole once it's tied. However, in order to get the arm holes anywhere close to the same size, you have to tie the neck tie uncomfortably tightly, and even then they don't quite match. It doesn't come with a belt, so I threw one on to try to get it to look like the pictures. Ehh...not exactly.

I'm 5'8" and this was WAY too short on me. For the 10 minutes I wore it and took these photos, I was in serious danger of flashing the landscapers.  No way I'd ever risk wearing this in real public. The fabric is extremely light-weight, which adds to the wind dangers and extreme static situation I was battling (and it's 84 degrees and humid here!). Despite being so light weight, it is definitely not breathable and I would be very uncomfortable wearing this on a warm day. Also, the print on the fabric doesn't match up from front to back. Honestly, that wasn't that huge a deal for me because the pleats kind of hide it, but it's worth mentioning.
summary: I wanted to love this dress

reviewText:
Actually, four and a half stars :)
I was really surprised that it came about a month early. It was estimated to come on August 15, and it came on July 15th! The color was really intense and a little darker than the picture (it looks like sky blue but it was more like, um, cobalt-ish) and I was afraid that the color would rub off but it didn't.
I thought that there would be something to adjust the strap but there wasn't. This is fine as long as you can tie knots and make it look nice.
One complaint, however, is that the flap is totally off center. It is crooked as well as way too high, making tha flap float about an inch above the bag. The latch works fine though so it's more of a pet peeve. Otherwise, the picture is pretty accurate. I love how the bag is big enough to fit all the essentials but not too big either. I can fit lip gloss, eyeliner, a small wallet, my iPhone, a packet of gum and two pens inside with no trouble.

I'm really surprised at how light this helmet is compared to my last one. I definitely don't have balloon head. I can hear well through the ear flaps, my older, smaller Smith goggles work perfectly with it, which I was worried about at first. Haven't found a place on the helmet to close the vents, but I doubt that will be an issue. Nice plush fabric on the inside. All in all I'm really stoked. No complaints at all.
summary: Super light, slim design, nice headphone integration

reviewText:
I am 5'7, curvy, 36 C, 30 inch waist, 40 inch hips. It is in my experience that when it comes to buying from China you HAVE to over estimate with size. That being said I ordered an X-Large. The package arrived in a great amount of time, the garment was clean and packaged nicely.

The dress fits as I expected it would, I am glad I did order the X-Large as the fabric is unforgiving (clingy) and the extra room left plenty for comfort.

All that said the reason I gave the dress 3 stars is because though it fits wonderfully, there details about the dress that made me buy that were not true.
The pictures make it seem as though the dress is sleek down the front, there is actually a seam under the bust line making this an empire waist dress. The seam is obvious ad though it doesn't look bad, it is not what I wanted.
The strap across the back of the dress looks like it should be thin and hit high close to the nape of the neck. False, in actuality the strap is a little over an inch thick and hits more like lower shoulder line.
The backless aspect is also very disappointing, the dress is backless however not nearly as deep as pictured, it dips about halfway down the back.

That being said, the dress is well made. The fabric is not see through. Depending on the fit you want I would go up a size.

reviewText:
First, it runs really big.  Not an issue for me, I wear a 34DDDD/36DDD.  I've worn adhesive bras back when I was a lot skinnier so I'm pretty familiar with how to situate the cups.

The thing with this bra is that the cups are made of such a soft gel material that they offer no stability, which means no support or shape.  I also think they are shaped oddly, instead of the typical dome shape these are more of an oval, like if you were to bend forward and hang straight to the floor they fit inside.  Then the plastic clip is very brittle and would not stay clipped, and I am certain if I kept trying it would break it.

It's a good start.  Hopefully they'll take our feedback and develop a better one.

I was pleasantly surprised by this product!  Have a large bust (36DDD), I didn't think that I would ever be able to wear a backless dress.  I was able to do so with these on.  They are a bit tricky to get on the first try, and each time you readjust them, some of the stickiness wears off. I would only recommend using them once or twice.  They provided much more support than I thought they would, but the material is so slippery that my strapless dress would not stay up!  I had to be on alert all night.  That being said, I would still consider ordering them once again for use with a different backless dress that has straps and more support.
summary: I would only recommend using them once or twice

I'm petite with a larger chest ddd so I was unsure if a bra like this would fit or not. I must say it fits perfectly and lifts well. Realistically it does not lift as well as a bra with straps and hooks but this adhesive bra provides great support even for us bigger busted girls. I absolutely adore this dress! The material is soft and durable. The dress is thick and slinky. It is the perfect size, and I've never felt more sexy in a simple house dress. I would definitely recommend this product, and this seller!

Measurements: 5'5". 135lbs, 34C/4, 36/29/37  Ordered: Medium

Sooooo, I knew this was a gamble as they didn't have it in a large, which is what I'd normally order from these overseas companies, but I was willing to give it a shot.

+ Soft material, very comfortable
+ Style is as it is pictured, with the scoop front and to-the-waist drop in the back
> it's minimally see-through
- It's a little short
- It's stretchy synthetic blend not cotton
- it's a little snug

I had planned on wearing it as a beach dress so the see-through thing isn't a factor, and its barely that anyway (only is specific light and if you're looking for it). You can tell, however, that in another color it would probably be more see-through than you would want for everyday use.
I'm more bummed about the fabric. Since its a stretchy synthetic blend and not cotton, it means that it will keep it's shape and not relax - good for most, a bummer for me since I was hoping it would.
It hits a bit higher than my ankle -- again, kind of a bummer, I had wanted it at least to hit at or even longer.

My sister said I should wear it around the house for a few days and see what happens, but I'm kind of guessing this is a bust. Even if I do, and it works, that would mean every time I wash it I'd have to repeat the process before feeling comfortable enough to wear in public.

If it had been the size I wanted, it might have been 4 stars not 3 (depending on length esp). If I could find it in a large or even an XL (even if it's in a different color), I would consider trying another, but I've had no luck finding other sizes which is how I ended up with the medium.

reviewText: I ordered this specifically looking for a coral dress. The color was PERFECT! The skirt portion material was high quality but i was surprised by the contrast of the top material... Because the color was so nice, i would have kept it if it fit but at 5'6', 160 pounds and 5 months pregnant, it would hardly fit on my DD boobs.

This should not be sold as maternity clothing. Perhaps it was a mistake. Unless you are in your first trimester of your first pregnancy, it will not fit your tummy without pulling and making the pockets pop out. The tube top is short, so its not  at all good for accommodating larger boobs during pregnancy. And the bottom half of the dress is a very stiff linen, no forgiving at all. Skip it! I have to pay to ship it back as well!

I would say that the cons to this dress are that it MUST be ironed to remove wrinkles (be careful when ironing due to polyester like fabric) and that I had to get the collar portion hemmed as it was much to large for my neck and dropped. Additionally, I put the dress in the washer on the delicate cycle, but the bow on the neckline still managed to fall off. Easy fix though, just sew back on by hand or leave it off - looks fine without it. The zipper in the back can be a real pain to zip up at the seem line, but it will zip with effort.

I would give the dress a 3.5. Flattering and quality fabric for the price, but be willing to tweek it a little.

Just cut in half, crotch to waist,  drop one onion in a leg, push it down and tie a knot.  Fill up the leg with onions, tying a knot after each one.  Hang it in a dark cook place..like behind the pantry door.  Keeps onions great. Cut off below knot when need one. You can wear them first if you like and then wash and use to store you onions.  TMI??

It is actually a pair of shorts with frills that make it appear more like a skirt. That's not a disappointment in my mind, and I'm frankly satisfied with it, despite the waist being a little tight. The belt is weird to me as it has no holes and you basically split the weaved strands to secure it (maybe I'm just not used to this sort of thing, but it seems odd). Ultimately, a good product, but might want to order a size or two larger because it is an Asian product. I usually wear a small, so I believe I ordered a medium; a large would have probably been the best choice.

reviewText: Cute, perfect for drizzly weather.

Let me start by saying that I completely love this jacket. The style is very cute and feminine. It has big brown buttons as opposed to snaps. The fabric is a nice pattern and the color is true to the picture. It's lightweight and 'swishy' but not plasticky in texture. The hood has snaps in case you would like to remove it. It's very comfortable and fit like I'd hoped. I am 5'6" with a 26 inch waist, and a Small fit me with enough room for layering and movement. I suppose some people may want it a little tighter around the waist, but it's no where near the flowiness of a full poncho. More importantly, I was pleasantly surprised with the quality of this jacket. I immediately put it under some running water and was really impressed when the water just beaded away. I'm not sure what prolonged rain might do, but the water resistance it had was very promising. I am completely satisfied with this item. It's fashionable and well made, and I absolutely recommend it.

For the price, these are amazing.

For fit - I bought the L/XL, and at delivery I was ~195 lbs (5'7") and it fit as expected.  If I was any heavier I would have wanted one size up.

I ordered three of these bridesmaids dresses in different sizes, so I ended up ordering from 3 different sellers. Even though you may see a link on the side to buy the same dress from different sellers, DON'T! They may be claiming to sell a Dressystar dress, but they're not. They're selling they're own cheap knock-off versions. There was a huge difference in the quality!!!!!
The original Dressystar dress was fantastic quality! From the quality of the fabric to the workmanship, everything was wonderful. The dress is fully lined with built-in bra and plenty of boning in the bodice for support. The top of the dress is beautifully ruched and the seams are strong and more.
The "other sellers" for this dress used cheaper quality fabric and the workmanship was much worse! One didn't even have any boning for support and the ruched top looked sloppy and messy. The seams  were not as strong.
In other words, as long as you buy from Dressystar, you'll be happy with the quality and workmanship! The dress is gorgeous and high quality!  (Just be aware that the dress is quite long, so if you're short or won't be wearing heels, you may need to hem the bottom)
summary: CAUTION! Make sure you buy directly from Original seller!!!!

reviewText: I fell in love with this coat as soon as I saw it online, and even more so when I received it! I bough mine in pink, but it is a touch different compared to the picture. It's more of a soft and pale peachy pink than a light or baby pink, but it's still lovely. Could easily be worn in both the spring and fall because of its color :) It is a bit lighter than your average "winter coat", but since you'd probably be wearing heavier clothes underneath, and/or a scarf during that time of the year, it would work just fine. One thing that is important to note is that it does run small. I'm 5'2" and 128lbs, and going by the size chart, and my usual size I would get a medium. However, since I know that Asian sizes tend to run quite a bit smaller than US, I was convinced after reading the reviews to buy an XL. It fits just perfectly in this size, so my advice is to get one 2-3 sizes bigger than your norm, (depending on your shoulder size too because it can be a touch more snug there.) Overall, this coat is cute, stylish, and casual all at the same time. I love that it's not bulky at all, and can easily be worn with a heavier piece of clothing underneath. So if you're looking for something along these lines, this could be a potential choice :)
summary: Very cute! Does run small, so get a couple sizes bigger to enjoy

reviewText:
Took the watch out the the package at 9AM. Tried to set it to the correct time. Note: I have been setting digital watches since I was 10 years old, and this watch is darned near impossible to set because it has only one (1) button. The same button you use to get it to display the time is the same button you use to advance the hour, which is the same button you use to tell it to go from hours to minutes, and so on. It took about ten minutes to set this thing, even with the instructions in front of me.

At 9:40, my son informed me it was now 12:00, so the watch must have reset itself. Another long struggle to get it set properly. He said, at this point, "It's garbage. I want a different one," but I put it on my wrist to figure out if maybe he'd done something wrong. Two hours later, it was still working, so I took it off and set it aside.

At 4PM, he looked at it on the counter and said, "It's 12:00 again," meaning this lovely piece of technology reset itself with no one touching it.

This is garbage. Tomorrow it goes back to the store and I request a refund. You guys can save yourselves the trouble and just not buy it at all.

(Note: At Target, this was only $7, not the price listed here, and it was still $7 too expensive.)

reviewText: I am from Baltimore, MD. I ordered this item on June 9, 2014, and received it on June 26, 2014. Very fast shipping from an item from China! I am 125 lbs and 5'8. I ordered the dress in a size XXL. These clothing sizes are Chinese sizes, so you will have to order one of two sizes up. I ordered two sizes up because I wanted the dress to be long enough since I am tall, and I have long arms. The dress fits perfectly. It isn't too short, it fits below my knees. And the dress sleeve length is long enough for my very long arms. The dress did have a very strange chemical smell, so Ill probably have to wash it. The dress doesn't have any instruction on how to wash it, so Ill probably wash it in cold water, and hang dry it. It is made of a thinner material, so you can wear it during the Summer, Spring, and Autumn times of the year. There is a zipper on the back of the dress, it camoflages perfectly with the back of the black dress. No issues with the zipper getting stuck. Only issue I have with the dress is the strange smell. If was a great purchase, and the price was very reasonable. I would recommend you to buy this dress. It is very unique, and very stylish. It is a must buy!
summary: Lovely Yellow and Black Floral Long Sleeve Dress.

I've gotten dresses off of amazon very similar to this, and all of them are super super comfortable and extremely cute. The material is silky, and (although it is from china)you don't have to worry about it getting ruined in the wash or sticking to your legs when you walk. However, don't wear a flashy bra or anything like that underneath it because the fabric is still pretty thin. One of the coolest things is that you don't have to worry about perfect sizing because the dress is loose, almost like wearing a gigantic t-shirt. I get compliments everytime I wear this dress, and it's one of my go-to dresses if I want to look nice and not have to uncomfortably fix my clothes during the day. The orange dress is a bright color, making it all the more fashionable, and it's cute even without the string tied around your waist. You won't find anyone else wearing the same exact thing as you, which happens all the time when you buy clothes from common dpt. stores. This kimono-style dress is an awesome buy for the price!
summary: Comfort AND Fashion all in one

Awful quality. I've had this bag for less than a year and it's completely destroyed. The nylon, especially interior nylon, is terribly weak. Moreover, the zipper snags constantly on the white fabric that surrounds it and has now completely ripped the bag apart.

I used this bag very lightly with a short commute to work and few materials carried inside. It's now completely unusable and unrepairable. If you are looking for a non-leather bag, I would suggest canvas or some other more durable fabric.

** Overall comment **
I absolutely love this bikini dress!  Ive gotten so many compliments over it.  Its not really a common design for your average one piece swim suit.  I love the fact that the front hangs over my mid-section and doesnt conform snug to the body.  I refer to it as my beer suit.  Living in Hawaii, beach barbeques are very common.  This suit allows me to eat whatever and consume as many beverages I want without me being self-conscious of holding in my gut.  It allows you to just feel free and enjoy yourself without having a care how far your belly sticks out because you cant see it.  It fits snug around the bottom half kind of like a mini skirt so it still gives off the appealing factor of wearing a bathing suit.  Another plus is that it reduces the area you need to lather yourself up with sunscreen.  If you know the Hawaiian sun, you need to reapply sunscreen a few times if you're planning on staying out.

** PROS **
1.  Very fashionable.
2.  Unique design.  Ive never seen anyone with this style of swim suit.
3.  Covers your mid-drift.  No sucking in your belly required.
4.  The suit is well made.  Its been through many washes.  Crossing my fingers it lasts forever and never gets damaged.

** CONS **
1. Nothing bad to say about this swim suit.  Ive worn it at least 20 times and washed it in the wash and it still is in great condition.  I still get compliments every time I wear it.
summary: ** Overall comment ** I absolutely love this bikini dress

There are two pins on the back to hold it in place on a shirt, not just one pin, -- so, it will not pull too much on a T-shirt.  I wonder if a smaller ring would be better for my eyeglasses.  Maybe the smaller the ring, the less likely the glasses would pop out accidently. A jeweler or DIYer could change the ring size with silver solder.
(My older one, from a different source -- gotten years ago -- has only one pin on the back -- so, glasses' & its weight may pull too much in one spot and pucker or tear a T-shirt or other thin cloth over time.  Also, it is thin enough (delicate, looks great) that it will bend a little over time, with use.  A small part of a wing tip broke off, and the ring part had to be repaired.  It still looks good.  But, I wanted a backup before the old one was no longer useable.)
worked great!
Pretty good. Thought they would be flusher on the back, but seem sturdy and won't fall off.
These work great for keeping my favorite pins in place.
Held my ribbons tighter than the cheap wing style backers. No need to worry about losing items now.
I have a lot of these and have been using them for years on my pins on my motorcycle outerwear. Never lost a one since I started using these.
good
Best keepers I have ever used. They lock on and don't come off until you take them off. Great item!!!
These are great.  They keep the pins from sticking through and into the skin.  They protect the skin especially with a seat belt pushing the pin into you.  We use these backs on our leather vests.

Super cheap, fast shipping. Only giving two stars because of price and quick shipping. The suit itself was a disaster. I got the extra large and it looked TINY. I normally wear a size 10/medium and I didn't even try on the bathing suit. Just by looking at it I could tell it would be too small. Plus, the top has NO support at all. Busty girls like me need support and the bra looked like it would barely be large enough for someone with a b cup, definitely too small for me (I wear a D).
My daughter wears a US juniors size 15, bra sz 34C. This suit fits her great.

My swim suit arrived very fast with amazon prime. I definitely love when sellers use prime great packaging and fast shipping. After reading the other reviews I decided to order a size a up and I'm glad I did.  This suit runs small but ordering a size up fit perfect for my bottoms.  The top however was to small and not very supportive at all but I usually wear a 36ddd so it's hard for me to find tops that fit in general.  The material was soft and not to thin which is wonderful a swim suit that's see through is not a good thing especially for me.  The stitching was good and seems to be really good quality.  The color I ordered was pink and it's very vibrant and beautiful.  The twist top is very cute and if it fit I believe it would be very flattering.  The straps are made to be removable so you have the option of strapless another positive. The snap in the back of the top also seems like it would hold up nicely even being to small in had no issues with breaking or seam ripping. I'm giving this swim suit five stars because the quality is great,  ordering a size up fit my bottom perfectly and the fact that the top didn't fit was my own fault.  It's a beautiful swimsuit and I plan to wear the bottoms with a different top.  I'm very pleased especially with the very affordable price now a days good quality for a good price can be hard to find.  I certainly recommend this suit but would advise ordering big because of Asian sizing.  I received this product at a discounted price in exchange for a honest review
summary: Good quality especially for the price and super cute and comfy

reviewText: cute suit, but the buttons have a tendency to fall off.

I am not sure where to start with this swimsuit. As other reviewers have mentioned, the sizing is all off. The bottoms and the tops appear to have been randomly picked and do not reflect a single size as a set.

When this suit arrived, I had high hopes. It is beautiful in terms of the cut and colors and style. I have to be honest and give the suit credit for it's attractiveness. But, the moment I pulled the suit out of the bag to try it on, as soon as I stepped one foot in one of the legs a button flew off of it and across the room. Seriously, across the room. No biggie, I could sew it on later...

The bottoms fit ok. They were fine in the hips and the butt, but the leg openings were a bit too snug and the waist was too loose. The suit bottoms came up about two inches above my navel, but the waist band was just too loose so the bottoms would slouch down about an inch below the navel.

The suit top...wow. I wear an upper C/lower D (size 12 overall,) and I ordered the XL because 1. Asian sizes run small, 2. I order almost all of my clothing online and am very accurate when it comes to my own measurements and sizing guides, so I know what I need to order, and 3. I considered other reviews.  This top...again, wow.  This top is so small I cannot even begin to explain. It goes around me just fine and the shoulder straps fit well, but the cups of this suit are maybe for an A cup at best.  I literally came out below and above this suit. The inserts inside the top cups are very domed and I am not sure who has this shape of breast that would make this kind of insert ever work.  As I took the suit off, two more buttons came off.

I had two friends try this suit on in the hopes I could pass it along to someone else. My first friend is a size 10. It fit her in the top as she is an A, but the shape of the cups was alarming. And, the bottoms fit like they did on me. My other friend is a 6/8. The bottoms fell off of her and the top (she's a B cup) was very awkward.

I received this product at a discount for my honest and unbiased review. Even at a discount, it is not worth your time, sadly.

This suit...
summary: The sizing is severely off and the two pieces are mismatched. Attractive suit, but it just doesn't work with sizing.

reviewText:
I love this silly little collar. I love the look of collared shirts yet find shirts under sweaters to be uncomfortable, bunchy, and overly warm, and this solves all of those issues for me. It's obviously not completely perfect (after all, what is?) -- if a sweater is really thin or tight, the shape of the collar can be seen though the material in the back. My hair is long, so this isn't too much of an issue for me, and my sweaters tend to be a bit thicker so that's also okay.

As for the pearl button on the top of the collar: I ended up removing it altogether and just skipped a button at the top of the dickey. No one has ever noticed and I doubt anyone would care even if they did.

For fit, I'm a 5'11"-ish woman with proportionally wide shoulders and this works well under nearly every one of my sweaters. The only sweaters it does NOT work with is boatneck sweaters, which aren't meant to be worn with a collar anyhow so it's a bit of a moot point. I recommend this product and would buy again.

The only complaint I have is that on the sides, underneath the armpits, the dress sticks out in a rather odd fashion, kind of folding out in a triangle type of shape. It gives the dress kind of an interesting look, but since it isn't pictured as looking like that I was surprised. However, it's nothing that a bit of hemming and a bit of time couldn't fix!

When I first opened the package and saw the dress, I thought it was going to be see-through. Once I tried on the dress it does not seem like it is, but hopefully in the sun it's not a different story! The dress fits as expected. I am usually a size 2, 5'1", measurements 34, 26, 36 and the small fit me perfectly. I am also a D cup and the inner lining fit me fine. I like the backless part of the dress although it is not exactly as pictured. The straps connecting at the lower back portion of the dress are not as spread out as they are in the picture, so it only really gives the appearance of 2 straps instead of 4. As far as material quality it seems fine. There are some frays in the lining but for the price I wasn't expecting perfection. I ordered the green dress and I wish I ordered the black. The green is not as bright as in the picture, just a regular dull green instead of a brighter almost sea-foam green that it looks like in the picture. I am giving this dress a 3 due to the fact that the color is not as expected and it will probably be see through in the sun so I will have to wear it as a cover up. On the other hand, I received the dress extremely fast! Ordered it on May 3rd and received it May 15th. Hope this helps.
